name: SUPER SEWER 128
description:
We found this 128-in-1 cartridge at a flea market, this is the only game that sorta works? Though things keep changing each time, and I think there's a soft lock. Been tryna get this little guy out of this room, but it keeps looping?

KNOWN BUGS:
  • Player switches to underwater physics
  • Player turns extremely teeny
  • Pits sometimes loop infinitely
  • Coins can be dangerous?
  • Turbo mode?
  • The controls get inverted
  • The player jumps like Kirby?
CONTROLS:

A&D - Movement

SPACE - Jump

P- Pause, Remap controls

CREDITS:

Steven - Code, Art

jpeg2k - Art, Sound, Level Design
